title: Conversation Suggests
description: This endpoint returns suggestions for things the user can say or ask the chatbot.

query.Name: query
query.Description: A (partial) query from the user. The endpoint will return if it matches topics it can talk about.

number.Name: number
number.Description: The number of suggestions to return (between 1 and 25).

quota: Calling this endpoint requires 0.1 points. Learn more about quotas.
